I'm still pushing all the buttons to find out what it does and maybe get the knowledge soon. The other question I want to find out is, Will there be a monthly charge on this Stick? It was not mentioned on any of the ads that you posted so, I or maybe some of us who purchased this merch do not expect any other charge.
